attributes.action: Make SCCRC Independent Of Legal System
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
At present 95 per cent of the Commissioners are from the legal profession.
When set up they were only supposed to be one third from Legal Profession.
Their Chief Executive holds four jobs within Justiciary which includes Temporary Sheriff.
He should resign.
Give us our two thirds independence promised.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
